issue.title: [CF 90] Setting position/scale in settings
issue.body:
Being able to set the x/y position, and the scale, for a group in the settings would be much appreciated! :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Inaeri | Imported from CurseForge issue #90 | Raw

comments.body:
What would be the point, though?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Keeping the addon in the same place on all my alts, mostly. I play a lot of healers, so I like keeping TellMeWhen next to my raidframes so I can see procs and cooldowns without having to look at my bars.

So being able to set the position and scale from the settings would make aligning TellMeWhen with my raidframes across all my characters a lot easier. :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Inaeri

I have something much bigger planned =)

Thanks for the idea.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
